title: "Power BI and PowerPoint: A Powerful Combination for Data Visualization is now generally available"
excerpt: "We are happy to announce the general availability of Power BI integration with PowerPoint. This integration makes presentations more engaging and informative by allowing users to create rich, interactive visualizations that can be embedded in PowerPoint slides. The is now available also in national clouds."
